title: Three dies as passenger coach overturns after hitting truck in Loralai
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP):At least three persons including women were killed while other dozens injured when a passenger bus overturned after hitting a truck near Loralai district in northeast of Balochistan on early Saturday morning.
According to details, police sources said that a passenger coach was carrying people when it overturned and crushed with a truck, in a result 3 people killed on the spot, a Private news channel.
The rescue officials, police and local people gathered at the spot of the accident and dead and injured trapped in the vehicle were removed and transferred to DHQ hospital Loralai.
The speedy passenger coach after colliding with the truck hit the footpath, an eyewitness said.
